task.title: Creating Additional Users
task.shortdesc: The includes a default login, admin/admin. You can create additional users for increased security.

context.p: You can use md5 to encrypt login information.

step.cmd: Modify the local-realm.properties file located in the etc directory.
step.info: When installed as a service, the location is /etc/sdc/local-realm.properties.

step.cmd: For each new user, add a line using the following format:
step.info: Currently, only the ‘user' role is supported.

You can generate the hash by running an md5 program, such as md5 on Mac OS X or md5sum on Linux program.
